name: FLY ONTIME AVIATION SCIENCES ACADEMY
about: Fly Ontime Aviation Sciences Academy is a premier institution dedicated to empowering aviation enthusiasts through comprehensive training programs. Affiliated with the International Air Transport Association (IATA), the academy offers a range of courses, including Airline Cabin Crew Training and Aviation Safety Fundamentals, available in both partner-taught and self-study formats. With a focus on industry-standard education, Fly Ontime Aviation Sciences Academy prepares students for successful careers in various aviation fields, ensuring they are well-equipped with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the industry. The academy's commitment to excellence and partnership with IATA underscores its mission to provide high-quality training that meets global aviation standards.
services:
["AIRCRAFT RAMP SAFETY AND BASIC MARSHALLING
CARGO HANDLING PROCEDURE
GSE OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE
HUMAN FACTORS IN GROUND OPERATION
PASSENGER AND BAGGAGE HANDLING PROCEDURE
AIRPORT GROUND HANDLING
FLIGHT OPERATION/DISPATCH"]
